channel.title: Comments on: We need German translators to promote Linux! And others are welcome too
channel.description: Notes from a disciplined software developer

item.title: By: Alexander
item.dc:creator: Alexander
item.description:
I am a native German speaker with Unix/Linux experience.
I can help you with the translation.
My email address is aschunk@gmail.com.
Best Regards
Alexander
